sentences.english: He is working in tandem with officials of the Serious Fraud Office.
sentences.chinese: 他正配合欺诈重案办公室的官员工作。

sentences.english: Our case loads kept increasing particularly in our felony division.
sentences.chinese: 我们重案组的工作量特别大。

sentences.english: He detailed a constable to take it to the Incident Room.
sentences.chinese: 他派了一名警察把它送到重案调查室。

sentences.english: Carrigan had escaped conviction for a serious crime.
sentences.chinese: 里根犯有重案却没有被定罪。

definition: abbr. for 刑事警察[xing2 shi4 jing3 cha2]/criminal police
to track down/to investigate and arrest
to investigate (as detective)/to solve (crime)/to uncover (a plot)/to sniff out/to break in and analyze/detective work/to scout
special duty (e.g. extra security or traffic control on special occasions)/person on special duty
to solve a case/shabby old table
SWAT (Special Weapons And Tactics)/riot police/abbr. for 特種警察|特种警察[te4 zhong3 jing3 cha2]
field work/field personnel/any occupation that involves a great deal of field work
